headless.hint: Starts a web server instead of the GUI.

headless-server-port.hint: Port for the web server, if started in headless mode.

update-debs-prerelease.hint: Update Debian packages from the pre-release branch

ros-domain-id.hint: Set ROS domain id. (for web server)

join.hint: Joins on start to given ROS domain id [host], e.g.: localhost:0

start.hint: If 'join' is set, start the ROS-MAS nodes.
